name: ESPC25 Smart Support Agent
description: A comprehensive Azure Microsoft smart support system featuring 8 progressive demos from keyword classification to cloud-hosted multi-agent orchestration. Event-driven IT support automation that processes emails, classifies them, searches knowledge bases, and automatically responds or escalates based on AI confidence scores. Includes voice interaction, multimodal capabilities, and enterprise integration with Microsoft Graph and Azure Communication Services.
highlights: 8 progressive demos showcasing enterprise AI capabilities
Event-driven email processing with Microsoft Graph webhooks
Multi-agent orchestration with specialized agents (Triage, FAQ, RAG, Ticket)
Voice interaction with Speech-to-Text and Text-to-Speech
Multimodal support with GPT vision capabilities
Auto-scaling Azure Container Apps deployment
Enterprise security with Managed Identity and RBAC
Copilot Studio integration with custom plugins
One-command deployment with comprehensive automation

name: Mermaid to Dataverse Converter
description: A modern React-based Azure App Service application that converts Mermaid ERD diagrams into Microsoft Dataverse entities, columns, and relationships. Features a wizard-based interface with real-time validation, CDM integration, and enterprise-grade security with managed identity authentication. Supports multi-environment deployment and comprehensive deployment history with rollback capabilities.
highlights: Modern React wizard interface with step-by-step deployment
Real-time ERD validation with auto-correction
Enterprise security with managed identity and federated credentials
Multi-environment support (dev/test/prod) with dynamic selection
Azure Blob Storage for persistent deployment history
CDM integration with automatic entity detection

name: BlueSky Terminal Poster
description: A Python terminal application that allows users to post text, images, @mentions, and alt text directly to Bluesky social network. Supports image attachments up to 1MB with accessibility features, @mention resolution with DID references, and environment variable configuration for secure authentication.
highlights: Direct posting to Bluesky from terminal interface
@Mention support with automatic DID resolution
Image attachment support with accessibility alt text
Secure authentication using environment variables
Simple and lightweight Python implementation

name: Microsoft 365 PnP Blog Contributions
description: Active contribution to the Microsoft 365 Patterns and Practices community blog, sharing knowledge about M365 development, Power Platform, and Azure solutions. As a member of the M365 PnP team, regularly publishing technical articles, tutorials, and best practices for the developer community.
highlights: Regular technical content contributor to M365 PnP community
Sharing expertise in Power Platform and Azure architecture
Community collaboration and knowledge sharing
Supporting developer community with practical guidance

name: FluentUI for Teams
description: Resources and components for implementing Microsoft's Fluent UI design system within Teams applications. Focused on providing developers with practical examples and patterns for creating consistent, accessible user interfaces in the Microsoft ecosystem.
highlights: Fluent UI implementation patterns for Teams
Design system consistency across Microsoft platforms
Developer resource collection
UI/UX best practices for Teams applications

name: SVG to SharePoint Converter
description: A utility tool for converting SVG graphics for optimal use in SharePoint environments. Addresses common compatibility issues and provides optimized SVG output that works seamlessly with SharePoint's rendering engine and modern web parts.
highlights: SharePoint-optimized SVG conversion
Compatibility with SharePoint rendering engine
Web part integration support
Graphics optimization for SharePoint environments
